txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Scouts bring word of the Vale-watch. It is under siege! The Frost-horde has swarmed upon our scouts there! While some of them managed to escape, many remain trapped in the ruins of Bizar-atrâd.

'We must rescue these dwarves!'
Your mission is to rescue dwarves at Bizar-atrâd.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Bizar-atrâd.
Some monsters in this mission will apply a flaming reflect shield to themselves.
You have been tasked with rescuing those caught in an ambush at the watch post of Bizar-atrâd.
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to Bizar-atrâd.'
'Well done! With the dwarves rescued, we can now look to reclaiming Bizar-atrâd. We can not allow the Frost-horde to control the Vale-watch!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
The watch-post of Bizar-atrâd, in the Grey Mountains, has been ambushed by a horde of dragon-kind….\n\nYour mission is to rescue dwarves at Bizar-atrâd.
